newsitem.title: USA: Sterling Software Inc Q4 oper rises.
newsitem.headline: Sterling Software Inc Q4 oper rises.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: The above results are for the quarter and year ended September 30.
The 1995 full year earnings from continuing operations excludes a $19.5 million charge to acquire KnowledgeWare Inc and a $62 million charge for purchased research and development.
The company said the above income from continuing operations results excludes income from discontinued operations from Sterling Commerce Inc, which was spun off on September 30, 1996.
Income from discontinued operations, net of taxes and exclusive of the minority interest held by stockholders outside of Sterling Software, was $13.7 million for the 1996 fourth quarter.
Income from discontinued operations for the 1996 full year was $177.3 million, which included a $126.1 million gain, net of taxes, on the Sterling Commerce initial public offering.
On a net basis, Sterling Software earned $0.93 a share in the fourth quarter, up from $0.90 a share last year.
For the 1996 full year, Sterling Software reported net earnings of $6.65 a share, compared to $0.39 a share last year.
